backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, voice model storage, and voice conversion job creation with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior across the project.
frontend/.env: Environment variables file containing the actual Replicate API token used by the frontend.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment template showing where to place the Replicate API token for local setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining warm-toned OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the SPA entrypoint and mounting the frontend React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and notification providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Component handling audio upload, Replicate token validation, and conversion job creation with progress and errors.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps children with authentication logic, showing a login card or loading spinner when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders a static brand logo image.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Displays a centered empty-state message with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Shows an inline alert with variant‑based styling and icon.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and lists conversion jobs in a grid, sorted by creation time, using JobStatusCard.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays conversion job status, offers audio preview and file download, and handles playback and errors.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and shows corresponding button states.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Renders a dropdown of available voice models with loading and empty states.
Lists existing voice models with delete confirmation and creation date display.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading voice models with validation, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create, and track conversion jobs, including integrating with Replicate for voice conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a function that maps a model ID to its name using fetched voice models.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: React Query hooks for listing, uploading, and deleting voice models with progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Displays the AI cover creation page, redirecting users if no models exist and showing an upload form.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a list of past conversion jobs or an empty-state prompt if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Page for uploading and managing voice models, including empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/services/voiceConversion.ts: Handles client-side Replicate API calls for converting audio using an RVC model with error handling and progress updates.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Parses backend error messages to extract cleaner, user-friendly text.
Downloads an ExternalBlob by converting it to a Blob URL and triggering a file download, with cleanup and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Reads a File into a Uint8Array with a 100MB size limit and proper load/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, layout, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state description including versions, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for a full rebuild.
